header.append: Set up passkey for easier login

passkey-append.body_point1: Quick and secure login using face, fingerprint or PIN instead of passwords.
passkey-append.body_point2: Passkeys are stored on the device or in the cloud, accessible from connected devices.
passkey-append.body_subtext: Biometric data will never leave your device.

passkey-benefits.body_introduction: With passkeys, you don't need to remember complex passwords anymore. Log in securely by using
passkey-benefits.body_loginMethods: Face ID, Touch ID or screen lock code.

passkey-error.body: Adding a passkey to your account was not possible. Please try again or use another method.

passkey-appended.body: You can now confirm your identity using your passkey when you log in.

email-otp.body_description: Enter the passcode sent to your email address

email-link-sent.header: Check your inbox to create your account
email-link-sent.body_description: We just sent a magic link to your email address

subheader.isOldTab: Return to the tab, where you have verified the email.
subheader.isNewTab: Return to the original tab to continue

email-link-error.subheader: Return to the tab where you are performing the signup and try again

phone-otp.body_description: Enter the passcode sent to your phone number

passkey-benefits.body_introduction: With passkeys, you don't need to remember complex passwords anymore. Log in securely by using
passkey-benefits.body_loginMethods: Face ID, Touch ID or screen lock code.

passkey-error.body_errorMessage: Creating your account was not possible with
passkey-error.body_tryAgainMessage: . Try again or sign up with one of the fallback methods below.

email-otp.header: Enter one-time passcode to log in
email-otp.body_text1: We just sent a one-time passcode to
email-otp.body_text2: . The one-time passcode expires shortly, so please enter it soon.

emailLinkSent.body_text1: We just sent you a magic link to
emailLinkSent.body_text2: . Click on the link in the email to login to your account.

identifier_already_in_use.username: That username is taken. Please try another one.
identifier_already_in_use.email: That email address is taken. Pleas try another one.
identifier_already_in_use.phone: That phone number is taken. Pleas try another one.

identifier_invalid_format.username: Username can only contain letters, numbers and “-” or “_”.
identifier_invalid_format.email: Email address must be a valid email address.
identifier_invalid_format.phone: Phone number must be a valid phone number.

errors.userAlreadyExists: Email address is already in use. If this account is yours, please log in instead.
errors.passkeyAlreadyExists: Passkey for this device already exists
errors.invalidPasskey: The provided passkey is no longer valid. Log in using your email address instead.
errors.invalid_challenge_solution_email-otp: The code is invalid or expired
errors.invalid_challenge_solution_phone-otp: The provided one-time passcode is not valid
errors.noConditionalUiSupport: Conditional UI is not supported by your device
errors.conditionalUiUnconfirmedCredential: This passkey can not be used yet. Please confirm your identify first by logging in with your email address.
errors.unknown: Something went wrong. Please try again later

unexpectedError.withCustomerSupport: Unable to complete action at this time. If the problem persists please contact support at {{customerSupportEmail}}.
unexpectedError.noCustomerSupport: Unable to complete action at this time. If the problem persists please contact support.

componentUnavailable.subheader: We’re sorry that our service is currently not available.
componentUnavailable.body_withCustomerSupport: Please try again in a few moments and if the issue persists, please contact {{customerSupportEmail}}.
componentUnavailable.body_noCustomerSupport: Please try again in a few moments.

passkeysList.warning_notLoggedIn: Please log in to see your passkeys.
passkeysList.message_noPasskeys: You don't have any passkeys yet.

dialog_delete.body: Are you sure you want to delete this passkey?

dialog_passkeyAlreadyExists.body: A passkey for this device already exists. If you are facing issues with your passkey, please delete it and create a new one.
